title: Беременна в 45
overview: Our whole life is a battle against stereotypes. When are you getting married? When you become a mum? When to have a second? 45 years old - is it too late? Overcoming, disappointment, tears, laughter, joy and happiness - the whole spectrum of human emotions will be seen by the viewers of the channel "Yu" in a new reality show about women who decided to become mothers after 45.
